entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in open areas late this evening and after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
